data.title: Indecision Records
data.meta_description:
Ai Mageddon by Apocalypse Tribe, released 13 December 2019

1. You Will Not Disarm Us
2. Self Defense Is A Human Right
3. We Won't Be Their Victims
4. Ai Mageddon
5. No Cause For Alarm
6. False Reality
7. Big Brother Big Pharma
8. Acid Attack
9. Fake As Fuck News
10. The Detention Camps
11. The Bleak Unknown
12. Turn Up The Pain
13. The New Normal
data.text:
1.

ONE WAY OR ANOTHER THE CHALK LINES ARE DRAWN • BEFORE YOUR FEET OR AROUND YOU WHICH SIDE ARE YOU ON • KNOW THYSELF AND KNOW REALITY • THERE'S SIDES OF THE STORY THAT THE NEWS WON'T LET YOU SEE • ENDLESS CONSPIRACIES OF OMISSION • I GUESS I'D RATHER BE A KILLER THAN A MURDER VICTIM • THOUSANDS OF INCIDENTS WHERE THE LAWFUL USED A GUN • IF THEY DIDN'T DEFEND THEMSELVES THEY'D BE DEAD AND GONE • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • SO YOU WOULD REALLY TRY AND FIGHT • SOMEONE HIGH ON PCP • IN YOUR HALLWAY IN THE NIGHT • I DON'T BUY THAT FANTASY • GOOD LUCK WITH YOUR WAY MA’AM, THAT'S NOT GOING TO BE ME • A VIOLENT WORLD THAT'S FILLED WITH CRIME • CAN'T BE AVOIDED ALL OF THE TIME • IT'S TIME FOR A REALITY CHECK IN • THE POLICE CAN'T RESPOND IN A SPLIT SECOND • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US • YOU WILL NOT DISARM US

2.

GET READY GET SET FOR THE NEXT DOWNGRADE • THE SLICES GET THINNER WITH EVERY DECADE • FROM THE AMERICAN PIE TO A PILE OF CRUMBS • TILL WE'RE ALL TRAPPED IN PUBLIC HOUSING SLUMS • NOT A DROP OF MERCY IN AN ENDLESS DROUGHT • SPREADING LIKE CANCER AND ROTTING OUT • AN INGRAINED CULTURE OF CRIMINALITY • WALLOWING INSIDE DEPRAVITY • SELF-DEFENSE IS A HUMAN RIGHT • NOT EVERY PLACE IS LIKE YOUR OFFICE PARK, CAMPUS OR GATED COMMUNITY • SOME OF THEM ARE WAR ZONES OVERFLOWING WITH SICKENING BRUTALITY • HOW MUCH MORE OF IT CAN WE TAKE WHEN REASON HAS BEEN TIED AND BURNED AT THE STAKE • NOW EVERYONE'S AN ISLAND UNTO THEMSELVES AND WE'RE TRAPPED INSIDE A WAR IN HELL • SELF DEFENSE IS A HUMAN RIGHT

3.

THE EXCESS POPULATION'S NO LONGER USEFUL • THE ELITES HAVE STARTED THE FINAL CULL • POISONED THE FOOD THE WATER AND THE AIR • IN OPEN CONTEMPT BECAUSE THEY NO LONGER CARE • THE ORCHESTRATED COLLAPSE OF SOCIETY • THEY ERASED VIRTUE THEY KILLED CIVILITY • THE STORM FRONT'S BOILING ON THE HORIZON • THERE'S NOWHERE TO RUN • NOW THAT WE'RE AWAKE TO ALL THEIR LIES • THEY WANT THE CITIES TO BURN BEFORE WE CAN RISE • THE AIRWAVES THE LECTURES, DIATRIBES ON THE SCREEN • CONTAMINATED WITH A HATE UNLIKE ANY WE'VE SEEN • THEY WANT THE ACCIDENTS AND ALL THE OVERDOSES • THEY CASH IN ON THE CULL NO MATTER WHAT BIG PHARMA SAYS • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS IF WE REFUSE TO COMPLY • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS IF WE DON'T REPEAT THEIR LIES • WE WON’T BE THEIR VICTIMS WHEN WE STAY UNIFIED • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS WE WON'T BE SWEPT ASIDE • THE ORCHESTRATED COLLAPSE OF SOCIETY • THEY ERASED VIRTUE THEY KILLED CIVILITY • THE STORM FRONT'S BOILING ON THE HORIZON • THERE'S NOWHERE TO RUN • NOW THAT WE'RE AWAKE TO ALL THEIR LIES • THEY WANT THE CITIES TO BURN BEFORE WE CAN RISE • WE'RE WISE TO THE GAMES THAT THEY'VE PLAYED WITH OUR LIVES • THE CORPORATE PRESS THE DECEIT THEY CONTRIVE • DOCTORS WHO DESTROY WITH THE PILLS THEY PRESCRIBE • THE LAWYERS WHO DENY JUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CRIME • SAFESPACE PROFESSORS PROPAGANDIZE • SKIP OVER THE WORLD COMMUNIST MOVEMENT'S CRIMES • THE ORDEALS WE'VE SUFFERED AREN'T THE WAY IT HAS TO BE • WE WANT LAW AND ORDER, PEACE AND PROSPERITY • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS IF WE REFUSE TO COMPLY • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS IF WE DON'T REPEAT THEIR LIES • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS WHEN WE STAY UNIFIED • WE WON'T BE THEIR VICTIMS WE WON'T BE SWEPT ASIDE

4.

Ai Mageddon 01:41

OUR REPLACEMENT'S ARRIVED WHILE WE STARED INTO OUR PHONES • ROBOTICS AND AUTOMATION HI TECH DELIVERY DRONES • THE ENGINEERS FOUND THE ANSWER TO MAKE THINGS MORE PLEASANT • FOR THEIR MASTERS LIBERATION FROM BOTHERSOME PEASANTS • Ai MAGEDDON IS NEAR • DON'T THINK THAT YOU WILL BE SPARED • Ai MAGEDDON IS NEAR • TILL THE WHOLE WORLD IS ENSNARED • CAN'T SELL AND YOU CAN'T BUY • YOU CAN'T LIVE BUT YOU CAN DIE • ACCEPT THE CHIP TAKE YOUR VACCINES • THE CORPORATE PROFITS WILL BE OBSCENE • A CATTLE DRIVE FOR THE HUMAN HERD • FORCED TO ACCEPT THE ABSURD • GOD COMPLEX DICTATORSHIPS • SMILE WHEN YOU EAT THEIR BULLSHIT • Ai MAGEDDON IS NEAR • DON'T THINK THAT YOU WILL BE SPARED • Ai MAGEDDON IS NEAR • TILL THE WHOLE WORLD IS ENSNARED • Ai MAGEDDON'S HERE

5.

No Cause For Alarm 01:33

THE SYNTHESIS OF HUMANS AND MACHINES • AN EVOLUTIONARY STEP THE WORLD HAS NEVER SEEN • THE STATE NEWS NETWORK HAS BROADCAST THE DECREE • RESISTORS CHILDREN WILL BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY • FOR THEIR CYBER UPGRADE IMPLANT SURGERY • ASSIMILATION'S NOW MANDATORY • JUST LIKE VACCINES BECAME OBLIGATORY • ALL WILL BE FORCED, UNTIL NO ONE IS FREE • THERE'S NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • SURRENDER TO THE AGENTS AND COME OUT UNARMED • THERE'S NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • COMPLY WITH THE SURGEONS AND NO ONE WILL BE HARMED • WITHOUT CEREBRAL IMPLANTS HOW COULD THEY SURVIVE • THROUGH ASIMILATION THEY'LL ADAPT AND THRIVE • IT'S NOT A SLAVE CLASS FOR THE MASTERS TO TURN ON • OF POSTHUMAN AUTOMATONS • DETROIT IS A FORETASTE OF THE FAMINE TO COME • GROTESQUE WEALTH AT THE POINTE, SLOW DEATH IN THE SLUMS • ANYONE WHO TRIES TO STOP PRESS WILL VILIFY • THOSE WHO RESIST, THEY WILL CRUCIFY • THERE'S NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • SURRENDER TO THE AGENTS AND COME OUT UNARMED • THERE'S NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • NO CAUSE FOR ALARM • COMPLY WITH THE SURGEONS AND NO ONE WILL BE HARMED

6.

False Reality 01:32

FEAR THE SCARLET LETTERS THE WITCH HUNT IS ON • BRAND'S GLOW IN THE FLAMES OF THE HELLISH WORLD THAT THEY'VE SPAWNED • SPEECH CODES ARE THE SIGNPOST THAT WE'VE FINALLY REACHED THE END • OUR FREEDOM OF THOUGHT'S CONTROLLED DEMOLITION • TRAPPED IN A NIGHTMARE A FALSE REALITY • NEVER MIND WHAT SIGHT REVEALS IGNORE THE TRUTHS YOU SEE • CCEPT IMPRISONMENT THE SURRENDER THAT THEY NEED • THE FEAR OF RUIN IS THE FIRE THAT THEY FEED • RUN WITH THE HERD OR BE TRAMPLED IT'S A SACRED COW STAMPEDE • NO MATTER HOW REPULSIVE BETTER SAY THAT YOU AGREE • CONFORM TO GROTESQUERIES THAT THEY'VE IMPOSED ON US • THE SHADOW RULERS WORLD STARTS WITH OURS SMASHED TO DUST • TRAPPED IN A NIGHTMARE A FALSE REALITY • NEVER MIND WHAT SIGHT REVEALS IGNORE THE TRUTHS YOU SEE • ACCEPT IMPRISONMENT THE SURRENDER THAT THEY NEED • THE FEAR OF RUIN IS THE FIRE THAT THEY FEED

7.

Big Brother Big Pharma 02:10

THEY FOUGHT AND SERVED IN A HELL ON EARTH • BACK FROM THE DEAD USED FOR ALL THEY'RE WORTH • NIGHTMARES AND WOUNDS IN CONSTANT PAIN • HOW COULD ANYONE RETURN THE SAME • THIS PRESCRIPTION WILL HELP YOU ADAPT • REDUCE THOSE FEELINGS OF BEING TRAPPED • BIG BROTHER BIG PHARMA WANTS YOU IN A NARCOTIZED STATE • THE ANGER YOU FEEL FROM INJUSTICE • IS SIMPLY ABNORMAL FROM MY ANALYSIS • BIG BROTHER BIG PHARMA WANTS YOU IN A NARCOTIZED STATE • MAINTAIN THE DOSE AND YOU'LL BE FINE • MASK THE REALITY OF HEALTH'S DECLINE • THE VA'S A NIGHTMARE A TANGLED MESS • RED TAPE AND PROBLEMS THEY COULDN'T CARE LESS • EXPLOITED TIME AFTER TIME • BROKEN BODIES AND SHATTERED MINDS • THE MILITARY'S THERE TO PROTECT US NOT TO ENABLE CORPORATE CRIMES • USED LIKE A MACHINE UNTIL THEY BREAK DOWN PUSHED BEYOND ENDURANCE RUN INTO THE GROUND • DUMPED BACK IN THE WORLD NOW HAVE TO RESET • MINIMAL SUPPORT IS AT BEST ALL THEY GET • REDUCED SUPPORT UNTIL IT'S THROUGH • SERVED A PURPOSE NOW THEY'RE DONE WITH YOU • BIG BROTHER BIG PHARMA WANT YOU IN A NARCOTIZED STATE • NOW WATCH THE MONEY SQUANDERED ON THINGS THAT DON'T REALLY MATTER • BIG BROTHER BIG PHARMA WANTS YOU IN A NARCOTIZED STATE

8.

Acid Attack 01:31

CORROSIVES SCALD THE SKIN AND EYES • MUTILATED FLASH DRIPS AS THE VICTIM DIES • LEFT DISFIGURED FOR ALL TIME • ARE THEY FORTUNATE IF THEY SURVIVE • CAN'T SEE OR BREATHE CAN ONLY SCREAM IN AGONY AS THE BLOOD STREAMS • THE SOLVENTS SPLASH THE SEARING PAIN • HOW MANY HAVE BEEN MURDERED OR MAIMED • IT'S JUST ANOTHER ACID ATTACK • THOUSANDS OF VICTIMS OF SADISTIC MANIACS • IT'S JUST ANOTHER ACID ATTACK • TELL ME HOW CAN THERE BE SO MANY HATEFUL ACTS • CHEMICAL BURNS DISINTEGRATE SKIN • BONES DISSOLVE FEATURES MELT AND CAVE IN • THERE IT IS NOW AGAIN ON THE SCREEN • WE'RE NUMB TO THE VOLUME OF THE CRIMES THAT WE'VE SEEN • IT'S JUST ANOTHER ACID ATTACK • THOUSANDS OF VICTIMS OF SADISTIC MANIACS • IT'S JUST ANOTHER ACID ATTACK • TELL ME HOW CAN THERE BE SO MANY HATEFUL ACTS • MAKES THE NEWS FOR A DAY AND THEN IT'S GONE • DEMPHASIZED SO THEY CAN KEEP US CALM • A CLOUD OF FEAR IN A STATE OF DISTRESS • TERROR TACTICS TO CONTROL AND OPPRESS

9.

Fake As Fuck News 02:31

WRONG IS RIGHT AND UP IS DOWN • PROPAGANDIZED UNTIL WE DROWN • THEIR TOXIC LECTURES NEVER THROUGH • HOW HUMAN CULTURES DEATH WILL BENEFIT YOU • THE ONLY WAY THEY CAN SELL THEIR FRAUD • PORTRAY DEFENSE INSTINCTS AS FLAWED • DISTORT REALITY ITSELF • IGNORE THE EXAMPLES OF PEACE AND WEALTH • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • A SET UP FOR US TO LOSE • FAKE AS NEWS • AN AGENDA DRIVEN RUSE • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • OMIT THE PAINFUL TRUTH • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • TILL WE ACCEPT THE HANGMAN'S NOOSE • DIVIDING POLARIZING INSTIGATING CONFLICTS • BLATANTLY DEMONIZING UNTIL EVERYONE'S SICK • THE NEEDLES IN THE HAYSTACK LOOK LIKE THEY'RE PILED TO THE SKY • THEN WE'RE SUPPOSED TO WONDER WHY POLICE WERE SHOT AND DIED • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • A SETUP FOR US TO LOSE • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • AN AGENDA DRIVEN RUSE • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS • OMIT THE PAINFUL TRUTH • FAKE AS FUCK NEWS TILL WE ACCEPT THE HANGMAN'S NOOSE • BLAMED FOR PROBLEMS WE DIDN'T MAKE • EVERYONE'S FILLING UP WITH HATE • TILL WE'RE KILLING EACH OTHER IN THE STREETS • THIS IS HOW THE MASTER'S HIT DELETE

The Detention Camps 02:02

THE NEO-STASI'S LISTENING TO ALL THE HOSTILE THINGS YOU'VE SAID • THE FILE ON YOU IS STACKING UP TIME TO RESET YOUR HEAD • IF YOU CAN'T BE RE EDUCATED YOU'RE GOING TO END UP DEAD • THE DETENTION CAMPS WON'T BE FUN FOR YOU • LOCKED UP IN A CAGE LIKE AN ANIMAL IN THE ZOO • THE DETENTION CAMPS IT'S NEXT IN THE CARDS • THE DETENTION CAMPS WILL BE FUN FOR THE GUARDS • WATERBOARDING PAIN COMPLIANCE THE LATEST TECHNIQUES • ADMINISTERED BY OFFICERS, TRIBAL-TATTOOED STEROID FREAKS • WORKING OUT ALL OF THEIR PENT-UP ANGER ISSUES • DAY AND NIGHT, NIGHT AND DAY THEIR PUNCHING BAG IS YOU • DON'T FORGET THE KICKING AND STOMPING TOO • THE DETENTION CAMPS WON'T BE FUN FOR YOU LOCKED UP IN A CAGE LIKE AN ANIMAL IN THE ZOO • THE DETENTION CAMPS IT'S NEXT IN THE CARDS • THE DETENTION CAMPS WILL BE FUN FOR THE GUARDS

The Bleak Unknown 01:54

BESIEGED THEN OVERRUN • FORCED ONTO RESERVATIONS • INCULCATE WITH BRAINWASH TO COMPLETE THE SUBJUGATION • FORCED INTO THE FOG OF THE BLEAK UNKNOWN • NATIONS DESTROYED CANCELED OUT BY TRADE ZONES • NOTHINGNESS • MONO CONSUMER CULTURE • ON THE RUINS • OF MINDS, THEY FEAST LIKE VULTURES • SOVEREIGNTY AND CUSTOMS INCREMENTALLY ERASED • UNIQUE WAYS OF LIFE DISSOLVED AND LAID TO WASTE • THEY WANT US TO SEVER THE BONDS THAT ONCE UNIFIED • FOR THEIR NEO SYSTEM TO RISE ALL THE OLD WAYS HAVE TO DIE • FORCED INTO THE FOG OF THE BLEAK UNKNOWN • NATIONS DESTROYED • CANCELED OUT BY TRADE ZONES • NOTHINGNESS • MONO CONSUMER CULTURE ON THE RUINS OF MINDS, THEY FEAST LIKE VULTURES • CONDITIONED TO DISMISS ANCESTRAL LINEAGE • TO DESPISE TRADITION SMASH THE FAMILIAL BRIDGE • DISMISS RELIGION AS THE SUPERSTITIONS OF FOOLS • ALL CODES OF CONDUCT FORSAKEN AND OVERRULED • FORCED INTO THE FOG OF THE BLEAK UNKNOWN • NATIONS DESTROYED CANCELED OUT BY TRADE ZONES • NOTHINGNESS • MONO CONSUMER CULTURE • ON THE RUINS OF MINDS, THEY FEAST LIKE VULTURES • WE WON'T GO INTO THE FOG OF THE BLEAK UNKNOWN

Turn Up The Pain 02:08

HAIL THE DAWN OF THE CYBER CONTINUUM • GOOD RIDDANCE TO THE LAST OF THE BIO HUMANS • THEY'VE BEEN DEEMED AN OFFENSE TO THE COLLECTIVE • PRIMAL INSTINCTS HAVE MADE THEM DEFECTIVE • ARCANE IDEAS LIKE PRIVATE PROPERTY AND THEIR OBSESSIONS WITH THEIR FAMILIES • WE WILL ALL BE EQUALLY MISERABLE IN A BOX FOR A LIVING SPACE • ALL THOUGHTS OF AMBITION AND REWARDS HAVE BEEN ERASED • FOR A WORLD WITHOUT CONFLICT FOR A WORLD WITHOUT CRIME • EVERYTHING WILL TURN OUT SO DIFFERENT THIS TIME • YOU WILL ONLY HAVE TO WORK 3 DAYS A WEEK BEFORE YOU REALIZE THAT YOU ARE TOO WEAK • A PRISONER INSIDE OF A TRAP LEFT DEFENSELESS WITH NO WAY TO FIGHT BACK • UNENDING SURVEILLANCE WITH NO PLACE TO HIDE • A WELL-FURNISHED CELL FOR YOU TO ROT INSIDE • UNCIVIL DISCOURSE THAN THE CIVIL WAR • THEY'LL TURN UP THE PAIN TILL OUR WILL TO LIVE WANES • UPLOAD OUR CONSCIOUSNESS TO ESCAPE FROM THE MESS

The New Normal 02:18
